A full exhaust system can definitely help unlock the potential of your GT-R's engine and provide a more aggressive sound. Just make sure to do your research and choose a reputable manufacturer that designs systems specifically for your vehicle.

It's great to hear that Alex's tips have been helping you improve your drifting skills! Controlling speed and angle are crucial skills to master in drifting, and it's awesome that you're seeing progress. Remember to always keep practicing and pushing yourself to improve, but also make sure to stay safe and within your limits.

Since you're upgrading your exhaust system, you might also want to consider getting a tune or engine management system to optimize your engine's performance. This can help you get the most out of your new exhaust system and ensure that your engine is running at its best.

Also, don't forget to keep an eye on your car's maintenance and make sure everything is in good working order. With a full exhaust system, you'll want to make sure your engine is properly tuned and that your car is handling the increased power and performance.

Remember to stay focused and keep improving your skills, and you'll be drifting like a pro in no time!
